reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a lovely hotel having been modernised recently but unfortunately we stayed in one of the non-refurbished rooms otherwise I would have rated them higher. Having said that the room was spacious and clean, jsut a bit annoying when you could see the type of room others were staying in.
reviews.title: Modern hotel in good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bar man was friendly enough but watch out if you are one of the last at the bar and he wants to go home as he will practically usher you out even though the bar is supposed to stay open until the last resident leaves.
reviews.title: great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Nice clean pool area with plenty of loungers but we were there at a quieter time so maybe in peak season would be different.
reviews.title: Great Hotel...... but

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel has a great location just a short stroll from the beach and on to the main road for bars and restaurants. Tsilovi itself is a lovely resort and you can have either a relaxing or lively holiday.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: i was honestly so worried about going on holiday, it was my first ever trip abroad! i did all the research possible and scanned all the reviews for months in advance (i know OBESSED!) the hotel was fab totally relaxed enjoyable quiet when needed and party time when in the mood, PERFECTION! the hotel is small, modern and super clean. want to go back again but my boyfriend wants to try somewhere new as he feels routine makes us old but STRUGGLING to find any where as perfect and small without being boring. i love love this hotel and hire a buggy its greaty craic and owners are angels x
reviews.title: Small very stylish relaxing hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank goodness for the Contessina Hotel. We had just endured 5 days and nights of the Planos Beach Apartments and requested daily for a transfer to more suitable accomodation. Luckily the Contessina Hotel had availability albeit we had to pay and additional charge it was worth every penny. As it was only then we could begin to relax and enjoy our holiday.
reviews.title: The Contessina Hotel is somewhere you would wish to return.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can only describe the change as going from a 1* to 5*, and we were not even in the refurbished rooms. Mary at reception was kind enought to allow us to view the refurbished rooms which were of a high standard and informed us that the remaining two floors will be refurbished at the end of this season.
reviews.title: poor first room, but steady hotel, pay for a fridge?????

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can only reinforce already what has been said about the exceptional high standard of cleanliness throughout the hotel.
reviews.title: The Double booked hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff make you feel welcome and do go out their way to ensure you are happy with all the services provided and more.
reviews.title: class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: It was refreshing to find a mix of nationalaties staying at the hotel with the majority of hotel guests being return visitors.
reviews.title: Make sure that you check that they have actually got a room for you before you travel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for 7 days. I had never been to Tsilivi before. The Contessina is immaculate. The rooms, pool, bar area are spotless. There was a good range of snack food available in the bar area and was reasonably priced, the drinks were a bit more expensive than some at the other bars. If buying water, soft drinks, ice cream it is cheaper to go to the supermarket.
reviews.title: Very clean and comfortable hotel, very impressed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The rooms were cleaned every day and bed linen and towels changed once in the week. Our room was close to the bar and pool area but we had no problems with noise levels. The rooms are basic but very clean, as you know you have to pay for the air con etc but we only paid for 5 nights and did not use the fridge or safety deposit so were only out 35 euro. The interenet is 3 euro for 30 mins. Had no problems getting a computer free.
reviews.title: lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We had no problems getting a sun lounger either late morning and did not see anyone leave towels out from night before. There was a mixture of Irish, English, Scottish and Welsh in the resort which was nice.
reviews.title: Mostly good bits

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010
reviews.text: Ilios is a legend and very funny. The receptionists were helpful. The hotel is on a side street which is nice.
reviews.title: Good Hotel but beware not all rooms are refurbished

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Overall Zakynthos was not as traditional as I expected, it has the usual strip of bars and restaurants but is not overly tacky as such. And so cheap compared to Spanish/Portugese resorts.
reviews.title: Hotel Good, Resort Spoilt

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Hotel is lovely, clean & modern, Rooms lovely size for 4, mini fridge & air con for hire if required ( air con definately was in august ) pool area great & breakfast is more like a full english than continental. Hotel is cleanist hotel we have ever been to, they are cleaning all the time & clean everything !!!
reviews.title: Brill

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is literally a 1 minute walk into resort, but in a quiet location
reviews.title: Overbooked hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Resort is also great, lots for kids to do at luna park, massive bouncy castles, arcades, quad bikes, lazer quest, trampolines, paintballing & all reasonable. Favourite place to eat was the fish & chip shop ( lovel fish chips & mushy peas ) & staff so friendly there.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tsilvi water park is a must 46 euros for the day & you get your lunch included if staying at this hotel.
reviews.title: Fab hotel,good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great family place & will definately return again
reviews.title: Nice hotel,shame about the resort!
